title: QIAseq Targeted DNA Panel for Illumina Instruments Part 5: Cleanup of target enrichment
author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs QIAseq Targeted DNA Panel for Illumina Instruments Part 5: Cleanup of target enrichment.
Links:
 Part 1: Mastermixes Assembly
 Part 2: Adapter Ligation
 Part 3: Cleanup of adapter-ligated DNA
 Part 4: Target enrichment
 Part 5: Cleanup of target enrichment
 Part 6: Universal PCR
* Part 7: Cleanup of universal PCR



Opentrons electronic pipettes
Opentrons temperature module with aluminum block set
Opentrons magnetic module
Bio-rad Hardshell 96-well PCR plate 200ul
USA Scientific 12-channel reservoir 22ml #1061-8150
Generic 200ul PCR strips (seated)



reagent reservoir: slot 3
 channel 1: nuclease-free water
 channel 2: beads
 channels 3-4: EtOH
 channels 10-12: liquid waste (loaded empty)
process:
Input your protocol parameters.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.

markdown.title: QIAseq Targeted DNA Panel for Illumina Instruments Part 5: Cleanup of target enrichment
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol performs QIAseq Targeted DNA Panel for Illumina Instruments Part 5: Cleanup of target enrichment.

Links:
* [Part 1: Mastermixes Assembly](./qiaseq-pt-1)
* [Part 2: Adapter Ligation](./qiaseq-pt-2)
* [Part 3: Cleanup of adapter-ligated DNA](./qiaseq-pt-3)
* [Part 4: Target enrichment](./qiaseq-pt-4)
* [Part 5: Cleanup of target enrichment](./qiaseq-pt-5)
* [Part 6: Universal PCR](./qiaseq-pt-6)
* [Part 7: Cleanup of universal PCR](./qiaseq-pt-7)

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)

* [Opentrons electronic pipettes](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes)
* [Opentrons temperature module with aluminum block set](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/tempdeck)
* [Opentrons magnetic module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/magdeck)
* [Bio-rad Hardshell 96-well PCR plate 200ul](https://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/sku/hsp9601-hard-shell-96-well-pcr-plates-low-profile-thin-wall-skirted-white-clear?ID=hsp9601)
* [USA Scientific 12-channel reservoir 22ml #1061-8150](https://www.usascientific.com/12-channel-automation-reservoir.aspx)
* Generic 200ul PCR strips (seated)

---
![Setup](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/Setup.png)

reagent reservoir: slot 3
* channel 1: nuclease-free water
* channel 2: beads
* channels 3-4: EtOH
* channels 10-12: liquid waste (loaded empty)
markdown.process:
1. Input your protocol parameters.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
